label: Wireless Technology
description: Products and services related to wireless communication and connectivity.

subcategories.label: Bluetooth Devices
subcategories.description: Devices that use Bluetooth technology for wireless communication.

subcategories.label: Walkie Talkies
subcategories.description: Two-way radios for communication over short distances.

subcategories.label: Smartwatches
subcategories.description: Wearable devices that connect to smartphones and other devices.

subcategories.description: Devices that use WiFi technology for wireless communication and internet access.

subcategories.label: Radio Communication
subcategories.description: Devices for communication over long distances using radio waves.
